questions.question: Identify any unexpected or underappreciated flow of lead value between sources and product lines.

answer.value: Old Customer Referral drives a disproportionately large share of revenue for Maintenance Service

key_insights: Old Customer Referral, a mid-sized source, has a disproportionately strong contribution to Maintenance Service

reasoning.reasoning: The original viewâ€™s density can hide these subtle relationships, so carefully examining the width and direction of all flows is necessary.
